definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="entity_despawn"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><next><block type="block_add"><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.FIRE</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><next><block type="spawn_particle_multi"><field name="particle">LAVA</field><value name="count"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">15</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="dx"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="dy"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="dz"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="speed"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="world_entity_inrange_exists"><field name="entity">EntityLiving</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="range"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_set_fire"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="seconds"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">15</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
